talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_00>A girl's gotta make a living! And how else
am I going to fund my ultimate research?
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>But my market research said that was a
reasonable price!<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, you'll just have to think about what
the ultimate culinary experience is worth
to you.
Here's that food you gave me.


<snd:TalkPositive_01>When you're ready to get ultimate,<sp:5:0:0> bring
me a <clr:0000>failed dish<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you have any <clr:0000>failed dishes<clr:ffff>, I'll elevate
them into edible art!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yeah. <sp:5:0:0>Haven't you tried throwing things
that aren't food into your cook pot?

When you do,<sp:5:0:0> you'll often end up with a
failed dish.

They can fail in different ways. There's
<clr:0000>dubious food<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>rock-hard food<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Dubious, they say! Rock-hard, they call it!<sp:5:0:0>
Psh. Just because you throw in some ore
or monster bits.
What terrible things to say, don't you
think? <sp:5:1:0>Haven't they ever heard the saying
"nothing ventured, nothing gained"?
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Success is built on failure!


Bring me your <clr:0000>failed dishes<clr:ffff> when
you're ready to turn them into
something amazing.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So, what'll it be? Are you ready to make
your dishes ultimate?
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>A customer? So early? That's fine...


Moza's Hideaway Restaurant opens early
so you that can start your day with the
ultimate breakfast!
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>Sorry.<sp:5:0:0> I was just thinking about my
life before becoming a master chef.

Bring me your <clr:0000>failed dishes <clr:ffff>when
you're ready to turn them into
something amazing.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Welcome to Moza's Hideaway Restaurant!


I'm about to close, but I don't do
end-of-day deals. My ultimate dishes
are worth full price all day!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Thanks for your busiâ€”


<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Hey! You don't have enough <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>!


Ugh. Here. <sp:5:0:0>Take your food back.


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Come again when you've saved up
enough rupees. <sp:5:1:0>No dine and dashing.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Here comes a customer. Ahem...


This is Moza's Hideaway Restaurant,<sp:5:0:0>
your destination for ultimate flavor!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Here at Moza's Hideaway Restaurant,<sp:5:1:0>
we're always ready to make your food
ultimate! So what are you waiting for?
Your <clr:0000>failed dishes<clr:ffff> are ready for their
second chance!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease_00>Sorry. That's just,<sp:5:0:0> um...<sp:5:1:0>really special.


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Well. That'll be <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>, please.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK. I'm ready.


<snd:TalkPositive_00>If you have<clr:0000> dubious <clr:ffff>or<clr:0000> rock-hard food<clr:ffff>, I'll
work my culinary magic.
talk0021: <sp:3:0:2:0000>So, are you gonna pay the <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ah! <sp:5:0:0>A customer! <sp:5:0:0>Can't get enough of the
ultimate dish?

I have a special announcement for
customers like you.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>Moza's Hideaway Restaurant<sp:5:0:0> is opening
its doors to the public!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Bring me your failed dishes anytime, and
I'll make them ultimate!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>Please visit Moza's Hideaway Restaurant
whenever you need that ultimate flavor!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>Wh-what happened here?!


What do you have to do to make
something like this? What did those
ingredients do to deserve this?!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>H-how?!


Can you even call this food?!<sp:5:0:0> There are
softer rocks! <sp:5:0:0>I might have chipped a tooth
just looking at it.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> I didn't mess it up, did I? Nah...


<sp:0:2:2:6400>Here you go!<sp:5:0:0> The ultimate dish, which is
surely perfect in every way!<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Chop it! <sp:5:0:0>Pound it! <sp:5:0:0>Steam it!<sp:5:0:0> Throw in a
Hyrule bass! Boil it! <sp:5:0:0>Cook it! <sp:5:0:0>Add that
raw meat!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Now just a pinch of the secret extract, aaand...<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_01>Done!<sp:5:0:0> Get a load of this! Done! Prepare to
be amazed!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Don't you <sp:5:0:0>dare<sp:5:0:0> touch that pot!


A chef lives and dies by their cook
pot! You can't just move it while
they're working!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired_00>Phew! Good thing I like a challenge.


And now...the ultimate dish.<sp:5:0:0> Behold!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Need some time to think it over, huh?


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Come back if you change your mind.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>With this extract, I'm unstoppable! It was totally
worth the trip to that town in the northeast.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
